name: Gamepad
description: The Gamepad interface of the Gamepad API defines an individual gamepad or other controller, allowing access to information such as button presses, axis positions, and id.

members.name: Gamepad.displayId
members.description: Returns the VRDisplay.displayId of an associated VRDisplay (if relevant) â€” the VRDisplay that the gamepad is controlling the displayed scene of.

members.name: Gamepad.id
members.description: A DOMString containing identifying information about the controller.

members.name: Gamepad.index
members.description: An integer that is auto-incremented to be unique for each device currently connected to the system.

members.name: Gamepad.mapping
members.description: A string indicating whether the browser has remapped the controls on the device to a known layout.

members.name: Gamepad.connected
members.description: A boolean indicating whether the gamepad is still connected to the system.

members.name: Gamepad.buttons
members.description: An array of gamepadButton objects representing the buttons present on the device.

members.name: Gamepad.axes
members.description: An array representing the controls with axes present on the device (e.g. analog thumb sticks).

members.name: Gamepad.timestamp
members.description: A DOMHighResTimeStamp representing the last time the data for this gamepad was updated.

members.name: Gamepad.hand
members.description: An enum defining what hand the controller is being held in, or is most likely to be held in.

members.name: Gamepad.hapticActuators
members.description: An array containing GamepadHapticActuator objects, each of which represents haptic feedback hardware available on the controller.

members.name: Gamepad.pose
members.description: A GamepadPose object representing the pose information associated with a WebVR controller (e.g. its position and orientation in 3D space).
